ack.p: This work was supported by a grant (Project number: 473111) from the Research Grants Council of Hong Kong SAR, in part from the Area of Excellent Scheme of the University Grants Committee of HKSAR (Grant AoE/M-12/06) on the Control of Pandemic and Inter-Pandemic Influenza and Theme-based Research from the Research Grants Council of Hong Kong SAR (T11-705/14N), Medical Research Council (MRC) program grant MR/K000241/1 to E.F. and Wellcome Trust studentship 102053/Z/13/Z to B.E.N.
